summary: Both previously reported issues were addressed with proper header/kid routing, origin binding, and stricter exp/iat validation, and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: verifySessionToken did not parse/validate JWT header or use kid-based secret routing
previous_issues_status.notes: Header is now decoded and validated, and kid-based secret selection is implemented with a legacy fallback.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Expiration validation allowed exp==now and did not validate exp/iat types or enforce origin binding
previous_issues_status.notes: exp/iat types are validated, exp is treated as exclusive upper bound, and expectedOrigin is enforced when provided.
